column5: Not a pro by any means but i have been tellin myself that i wanna get into fishin trout for a while now and dedicated myself to 4 days of hittin tribs this week.....  I had a great time and had some good teachers, but think i am finally gettin the jist of it!!!  I actually had not caught anything the first two times i was out with my buddy but then i went out alone and got fish!!!!  what a feeling.... in total i got two fish that were picture worthy and 4 little shakers.... i love it!!!!   can't wait to get out nextg weekend..... only thing, is that now i wanna upgrade my outfit.... currently i'm running a stanton on a 13ft avid.... i like it a lot but really wanna upgrade to an islander with a nicer rod!!  enjoy the pics guys... nothin crazy but definitely is a start!!
Great report and pics!!!... looks you're well on your way!
Nice Fish Congrats on the steelies they are great Fun to catch
Nice pics.  Congrats man.  I really like that last close up one.
Nice trout man they got some great color on them   jordan
nice fish, first one is really fresh
Great pics bud.  But whatever you do, DO NOT SELL YOUR STANTON!!!  They are not made anymore and are worth good coin.  Saw one on eBay go for 750!
Yeah i have an islander nothing special, the rod is the most important thing IMO
Sweet Pix and good size.  Let's hook up soon.
beautiful colours on those last two pics!
thanks a lot guys.... yea i am thinking a keeping the old set up still.... always good to have a back up................
Sweet stuff dude.. maybe me you and Shompz could hook up one of these days ya know!
O fa sho!!!!!!!!!!!   Sick!!!!!!!!!!!! hahaha  yea man i'll talk to you guys soon!
well man it looks like you got the hang of it now,  way to go nice report and love those pics,those bows look great

Nice pics bud and WTG !!! Stealheading is a blast and the beauty it doesn't take alot of time to get the hang of it when the fish are cooperating.... I love the the big head picture....I got one word for that pic.....Wallpaper !!! It is now the background for my desktop,hope you don't mind

NICE JOB BRO!!! THAT FIRST FISH IS EITHER A SKAMANIAN OR A SPWANED OUT 1!! GOOD JOB AND KEEP UP THE WORK!! THE AVID IS A WET NOODLE (HARD ROD TO USE) I'VE USED ALOT OF ROD BUT I FIND THE SEMI-NEW RAVEN IM8 TO BE THE BEST STEELHEAD ROD I'VE EVER UESD(GOT 3 NOW  LOL) MAKE SURE YA PICK IT UP AND WHIP IT AROUND WHEN YOUR OUT SHOPPIN!!
Nice fish bro. I keep tellin myself that I need to get out more, but I never seem to. Hopefully this weather holds up and I can get out the next 3 days!
thanks a lot guys.... don't mind at all about the wallpaper.... be my guest!!!!  CC... how much do those new IM8's go for.... ????

If your looking at rods check out Fenwicks, Ive got one and I love it to death. Its really tough, light and sensitive but also has enough backbone to fish salmon. At 11.5 feet (I think) its perfect for drifting the smaller rivers that I fish, but im sure it would handle bigger ones as well.
